changeSet.author: nhanlon2
changeSet.comment: AppConfigElementDescriptor for Galaxy App: id, descriptor_id, app_id
changeSet.sql: insert into AppConfigElementDescriptor (id, descriptor_id,app_id) select null, pd.id, app.id from PropertyDescriptor pd, App app where app.name="app.galaxy" and pd.name='GALAXY_URL';
insert into AppConfigElementDescriptor (id, descriptor_id,app_id) select null, pd.id, app.id from PropertyDescriptor pd, App app where app.name="app.galaxy" and pd.name='GALAXY_APIKEY';
insert into AppConfigElementDescriptor (id, descriptor_id,app_id) select null, pd.id, app.id from PropertyDescriptor pd, App app where app.name="app.galaxy" and pd.name='GALAXY_ALIAS';
